page.title: 06DAY IN THE LIFE OF AN ADULT
page.content: I GET UP AT AROUND 7.30 AND MY FIRST JOB IS TO FEED MY TWO BLACK CATS WHO ARE ALWAYS WAITING FOR THEIR BREAKFASTS. THEN I PREPARE BREAKFAST FOR MY HUSBAND AND MYSELF. THIS CONSISTS OF FRUIT JUICE, PORRIDGE AND BACON AND EGG. AFTER WASHING THE DISHES I DO THE HOUSEHOLD CHORES LIKE HOOVERING AND DUSTING. THIS DONE, I FEED MY TWO DONKEYS, SNOW FLAKE AND SNOW BALL. BY THIS TIME IT IS TIME TO START PREPARING LUNCH WHICH IS YORKSHIRE PUDDINGS ROAST BEEF AND VEGETABLES FOLLOWED BY A SWEET. HAVING WASHED THE DISHES ONCE MORE, I GET READY TO JOURNEY BY CAR TO DO SOME SHOPPING AT THORNE, BUYING VEGETABLES AND FRUIT FROM THE MARKET AND GROCERIES FROM THE SUPERMARKET. AFTER HAVING A REFRESHING CUP OF COFFEE AT ONE OF THE CAFES, I ARRIVE HOME ABOUT 4.30 IN TIME TO PREPARE TEA WHICH IS
